coreAttributes.name: Innoxia's Gift
coreAttributes.description:
Once thought to be lost forever, this bottle of bubbling pink liquid has made a surprise return, and can turn anyone who drinks it into a demon!
[style.italicsMinorGood(While this is a debug-only item, it should be safe to use anywhere.)]
coreAttributes.applyEffects: #IF(!npc.isPlayer() && npc.isUnique() && (!npc.isSlave() || npc.getOwner().isPlayer())) [style.italicsDisabled(This item does not work on non-slave unique characters...)] #ELSEIF(npc.getSubspeciesOverride()==SUBSPECIES_HALF_DEMON) [##npc.setBody(npc.getGender(), SUBSPECIES_DEMON, RACE_STAGE_GREATER, false)] [##npc.setSubspeciesOverride(SUBSPECIES_DEMON)] [style.italicsDemon([npc.NameIsFull] now [npc.a_race]!)] #ELSE [##npc.setBody(game.getCharacterUtils().generateHalfDemonBody(npc, npc.getGender(), npc.getBody().getFleshSubspecies(), true), false)] [style.italicsDemon([npc.NameIsFull] now [npc.a_race]!)] #ENDIF

useDescriptions.selfUse: The moment [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the stopper out from the bottle of Innoxia's Gift, [npc.sheIs] filled with a desperate need to drink the bubbling pink liquid contained within. Instantly, [npc.she] [npc.verb(bring)] the bottle to [npc.her] [npc.lips] and [npc.verb(gulp)] it all down, suppressing [npc.her] gag reflex as [npc.her] senses are overwhelmed by how sickeningly sweet it is.
useDescriptions.otherUse: Pulling out the stopper from the bottle of Innoxia's Gift, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips]. Instantly, [npc2.she] [npc2.verb(gulp)] it all down, suppressing [npc2.her] gag reflex as [npc2.her] senses are overwhelmed by how sickeningly sweet it is.
